entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF VERY LIGHT DRIZZLE
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, INCREASING TO NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, INCREASING TO 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
